text: He imandarasakala! Tomalokara ki haâ€™la, tomalokaka yetiya allahara pathara abhiyanata olabalai koraa haya, tetiya kiya tomaloke bharaakraanta hai prthiraikhanake sarati dharaa? Tomaloke akhiraatara paraibarte parthira jiranata santusta haicha neki? Akhiraatara tulanata parthira jiranara bhogara upakarana ati naganya
